title: Discover the updated Japan! ğŸŒ¸ MSFS World Update 20 + YS-11 Scenic Review
description:
Pack your bags, virtual pilots, because we're heading to Japan! âœˆï¸ Microsoft Flight Simulator has just received one of its most beautiful updates yet, and we're diving in to explore every detail.

In this video, we'll review the stunning *World Update 20: Japan*, which completely transforms the country with breathtaking new detail.

ğŸŒ¸ What's New in Japan?

*23 Photogrammetry Cities*: Explore hyper-realistic versions of Tokyo, Kyoto, Sapporo, Hiroshima, and more!

*67 Hand-Crafted Points of Interest*: Soar past the iconic Mount Fuji ğŸ—», circle the historic Osaka Castle ğŸ¯, and marvel at modern wonders like the Fukuoka Tower ğŸ—¼.

*5 New Airports*: Land at meticulously detailed airports including Kitakyushu (RJFR), Rishiri (RJER), and the futuristic Hokkaido Spaceport (RJBJ).

*Brand New Missions*: Test your skills with new discovery flights, landing challenges, and a scenic bush trip across the Japanese landscape.

We'll also be reviewing the *Local Legend 22: NAMC YS-11*. This iconic twin-turboprop, known as the "Samurai," was Japan's first and only successful homegrown airliner post-WWII.

After we see what's new, I'll guide you step-by-step through the in-sim Marketplace to make sure you get all this amazing content installed correctly.

If you love exploring the world in MSFS, make sure to hit that LIKE button and SUBSCRIBE for more scenic adventures! What's the first place you'll fly to in the new Japan? Let me know in the comments! ğŸ‘‡
